name: Ghost Forward
description: GhostForwarder is a Telegram bot based on pyrogram, designed to simplify media transfer from chats with anti-forward/copy restrictions to your specified destination chats. With GhostForwarder, you can seamlessly move media files while preserving the privacy and integrity of your interactions.

SESSION_STRING.description: Session string from auth.py file or use the Replit link button in README.md
